usereventscript.name: ARKA_SUE_Est_dispatcher2
usereventscript.description: This is a UserEventScript dispatcher for the estimate record. It's purpose is to combine the scripts: ARKA_SUE_AddSyncQuoteButton, ARKA_SUE_AutodeskNxmFieldValidation, ARKA_SUE_BluebeamHandleDynamicSalesRep, ARKA_SUE_CalculateExtendedCostAndPoRate, ARKA_SUE_CheckOutsideItemGroup, ARKA_SUE_CreateContactManagerField, ARKA_SUE_DatechFieldValidation, ARKA_SUE_DisplayWarningEstMessage, ARKA_SUE_DuplicateEstimate, ARKA_SUE_LimitTransactionStatus, ARKA_SUE_NBEPersonas, ARKA_SUE_SetExpectedCloseDateFieldOnEstimate, ARKA_SUE_WarningOnTransaction onto a single file for performance improvements. Please refer to each individual file to see how they works
